meanings.definition: A person who makes amendments or improvements.
meanings.sent1: The amenders fixed the broken fence in the park.
meanings.sent2: The amenders worked together to repair the old bridge.
meanings.sent3: The amenders added extra toppings to the pizza for fun.
meanings.sent4: The amenders were like artists, painting over the mistakes of the past.
meanings.sent5: The diligent amenders transformed the dull garden into a vibrant oasis.

meanings.definition: Those who amend or make changes for the better.
meanings.sent1: We appreciate the amenders who strive to create a more inclusive community.
meanings.sent2: The amenders in the committee proposed new ideas for the project.
meanings.sent3: The amenders surprised everyone with their creative solutions.
meanings.sent4: The amenders were like superheroes, swooping in to save the day.
meanings.sent5: The dedicated amenders never gave up on making the world a better place.
